# Instructions on how to build OpenCV 2.0 with Cocoa/Quicktime support


== Requirements ==

  * Snow Leopard (for now)
  * XCode 3.x
  * CMake

== Instructions ==

{{{
$ ccmake -G "Unix Makefiles"
$ make
$ make install
}}}

By default Cocoa will be used over Carbon. When Cococa is used by default the code will be build for x86_64. This means that other extensions such as Python and FFMpeg may stop working. (This can be fixed if 64bit versions of these libraries is installed).
